com.groupA.location.world

Class CreaturesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.groupA.location.world.CreaturesManager

  • public class CreaturesManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of the various players, beacons, and targets (Sharing of beacons and targets between players not yet implemented)
